NOTES:
This is a rip off the original iso which was supplied by bishes...thanks again.
The release was fullscreen....big black border at the top and was cropped slightly on both sides..
The picture was also a bit dark and had a low res ....
Audio for a cam was good,but then alot of other cams.

I know there is now several versions by different people,so if you want it grab,if not move along......simple really.


WORK DONE:
Firstly stripped the audio and then remastered it in adobe audition...changing the EQ and running it through a hiss reduction filter.
Then removed the menu off the begining and then remuxed the aufio and video back together.
The video needed to be cropped mostly at the top to remove the black border....also needed to adjust the colour and brightness of this release,by
changing the chroma and contrast,whilst also adding more gamma and lowering the rgb black base.
